name: Antechamber - Gamedev.tv Game Jam 2022 Submission
description:
Gamedev.tv 2022 Game Jam - Theme: Death is only the beginning.

First Person Psychological Horror / Puzzle 

INSTRUCTIONS / STORY:

After the tragic death of your family, you must relive your nightmarish past and make sense of the events that happened.

Follow the doors.. just like in life there maybe consequences for each path you take.. they just might change your fate.


Credits:
Ghostware Interactive:
Brett Gerber
Justin Wiechec
Kelly Gerber
